name: Covanta Holding Corporation
description: Covanta Holding Corporation is a global leader in sustainable waste management and energy production. Founded in 1986 and headquartered in Morristown, New Jersey, Covanta specializes in converting waste into renewable energy. The company operates a network of energy-from-waste plants that utilize advanced technologies to process municipal solid waste, significantly reducing landfill use while generating clean electricity. Covanta is committed to environmental stewardship and sustainability, providing communities with effective solutions to manage waste while promoting a circular economy. With a focus on innovation, Covanta invests in technologies that enhance waste processing efficiency and reduce emissions, striving to minimize its ecological footprint. The company also engages in recycling initiatives and the recovery of valuable materials from waste streams. Covanta's mission is to create a cleaner, greener future by transforming waste into a resource, contributing to local economies, and supporting climate change mitigation efforts.
